Blog.post: Today started out like evey other day but when I got to P.E. the got so much better.I was talking with A girl named Denille in my class and we were just talking about shit then she started saying shit like I was hot and crap it was good then she said but I have a boyfriend and I was like you don't want to cheat on him or any thign she was like ya but your realy cute. And i didn't denie it but she boy friend got kick out of summer school so it's just me and her so thats good and this week end she diching her boy friend to hang out with her mom so I was thinking I can steel her from her boy friend. She wants me to call her on monday after she gets back from camping with her mom. And she's fucking hot and kinda easy if you are going out with her so if end up going out I'm ganna get laid.

well i got drunk again but it wasn't my falt david and kayla were forcing me to drink i couldn't do any thing about it.Lets see I had one at davids and I had one on the way home and I had one or two ciggerets at davids so I had a buzz but when I had the one going home I got shit faced I think it was because we were moving and my blood was pumping that kinda thing so ya it was fuck up when I got home because my parents wanted to talk with me about god knows what and I was like I'm tierd I want to go to bed and it wasn't even that late this was all after my parents and I ate dinner and were talking about drugs beer ciggerets and shot so it was freeky but I got through it.

to day started out slow david stayed at my house last night. In the morning david the pig fucker(and no kayla im not calling you a fucking pig) woke me up and said we had to leave right then so I was falling asleep walking to davids. We were just sitting around so david called up his little band friends for a practis at his house and Kayla didn't fill like doing shit so my and davids sister drove to Kayla's to pick up some of davids shit, Oh ya after I went home and stole some beers it was good, but anyway me and davids's sister got his shit and went to the gas staiton by kayla's and got cigerets I got a pack to because skool has been realy stress full lately if fucking get adickted to them I'm going to kick my fucking ass then who ever els whants to can. Then david and I went to Kayla's and I asked for a half of the box so she fucking gives me a half of one hot pocket smart. And Kayla says that I was drunk hahaha. That was my fun filled day.

im going pawnshoppin with david today then were going to kayla's house and according to the little qwiz shit that kattie does all the time i have a 13 inch dick and david has a 4 inch one hahaha the bitch and im drunk I just thought you might want to know hehehehe.

Today started out good i went to the office during math. I got the V.P.s to take off my half absents in P.E. but I had to signe a contract saying if I'm tardy or absent any more I will lose credit on the spot, sounds good. I got the contract be for lunch so brandon and I went out for lunch we were running late so we fucking hald ass back to school we almost ran a guy off the road we got to the school when the bell rang so we ran up stairs to the gym but no one was there so we ran out side and the class was by the tennis cort I gave the teacher the contract she "ok thats good" then she touck role and me and brandon said he and all that bull shit the when I got home my mom said she got a call from the V.P. saing I was late so it voids the contract so now I'm fucked. But im going to tell the P.E. teacher the fucking bitch that we weren't tardy we just couldn't fined the class.

My fucking parents are going all anal and shit over my fucking absents in summer school. first I prove that I was in class on tuseday so I wouldn't lose credit for fucking gay ass P.E. then my parents fucking ground me for the other absents I all ready had and that they fucking know about like two fucking weeks ago. God damn it I wish I had a fucking job so I could leave.
I think that blog is a waist of time sense I have a lot of time I thought I would make one so I can put my most depressing thoughts on the inter-net like everyone else.
